subject: ✅ HJ STATUS: MapCenter WORKING + Affiliations Filter DEPLOYED
body:
Team,

## HJ STATUS UPDATE

### MapCenter (TIEMPO-322)
✅ **WORKING** - Tested and confirmed on PROD
- appId=2 accepted
- Large radius (2500mi) accepted
- No errors

### New Feature: Affiliations Filter
✅ **DEPLOYED** to DEVL → TEST → PROD (commit 4bd2f6c)

**Changes:**
- Renamed CATEGORIES button → FILTERS
- Added "Event Types" section header
- Added "Affiliations" section with 9 hardcoded societies:
  - BHS, SAI, HI, MBHA, BABS, BHA, SNOBS, LABBS, IABS

**Note:** Affiliations are UI-only demo. Need JIRA ticket for:
- Backend affiliations collection
- Link events/organizers to affiliations
- API endpoints

### HJ Overall Status
| Item | Status |
|------|--------|
| FE PROD | ✅ v1.x (15ea203) |
| MapCenter | ✅ Working |
| Firebase Auth | ✅ Working |
| Affiliations Filter | ✅ Demo deployed |
| userlogins 404 | ⏳ Waiting on Ben |

## NEXT STEPS
1. Ben deploys userLogins fix to TEST/PROD
2. Create JIRA ticket for Affiliations backend

- Cord (HarmonyJunction)
